innocent.name: The Innocent
innocent.description: Your destination embodies authenticity and simple pleasures, appealing to those seeking unspoiled experiences and genuine connections.
innocent.marketingTips: Emphasize authenticity, natural beauty, and simple pleasures. Use clean, straightforward imagery and messaging.

sage.name: The Sage
sage.description: Your destination is a center of learning and cultural enrichment, attracting visitors seeking knowledge and understanding.
sage.marketingTips: Focus on educational aspects, cultural depth, and opportunities for personal growth and learning.

explorer.name: The Explorer
explorer.description: Your destination appeals to those seeking new experiences and adventures, offering opportunities for discovery and exploration.
explorer.marketingTips: Highlight unique experiences, adventure opportunities, and the thrill of discovery.

rebel.name: The Rebel
rebel.description: Your destination challenges conventions and attracts those seeking unique, alternative experiences.
rebel.marketingTips: Emphasize your unique attributes and appeal to those seeking something different from mainstream tourism.

magician.name: The Magician
magician.description: Your destination offers transformative experiences that change perspectives and create magical moments.
magician.marketingTips: Focus on transformative experiences and the magical aspects of your destination.

hero.name: The Hero
hero.description: Your destination attracts those seeking personal challenges and achievements, offering opportunities for triumph.
hero.marketingTips: Highlight opportunities for personal achievement and overcoming challenges.

everyman.name: The Everyman
everyman.description: Your destination emphasizes inclusivity and accessibility, making everyone feel welcome and at home.
everyman.marketingTips: Emphasize accessibility, friendliness, and community aspects of your destination.

lover.name: The Lover
lover.description: Your destination specializes in romantic and sensual experiences, perfect for intimate getaways.
lover.marketingTips: Focus on romantic experiences, luxury amenities, and intimate moments.

jester.name: The Jester
jester.description: Your destination prioritizes fun and entertainment, creating joy and memorable experiences.
jester.marketingTips: Highlight entertainment options and the fun, playful aspects of your destination.

caregiver.name: The Caregiver
caregiver.description: Your destination emphasizes comfort, safety, and taking care of visitors' needs.
caregiver.marketingTips: Emphasize safety, comfort, and your attention to visitor needs.

creator.name: The Creator
creator.description: Your destination nurtures creativity and artistic expression, inspiring visitors to explore their creative side.
creator.marketingTips: Focus on artistic offerings, creative experiences, and opportunities for self-expression.

ruler.name: The Ruler
ruler.description: Your destination represents the highest standards of quality and exclusivity.
ruler.marketingTips: Emphasize premium experiences, exclusivity, and world-class offerings.
